cookiePolicy.section1Body: Cookies and similar technologies (SDKs, identifiers) are small digital components that help the app function correctly. They do not directly identify you.
cookiePolicy.section2Body:
Strictly Necessary: For session management and security.

Performance and Analytics: Understand which stories are read, data evaluated anonymously.

Personalization: Remembers language preference and reading level.
cookiePolicy.section3Body:
- To ensure the app runs safely.
- To make the reading experience more fluid.
- To remember settings.
- To identify features for future development.
cookiePolicy.section4Body: We apply minimum data usage when working with third-party partners.
cookiePolicy.section5Body: Parents can limit these technologies via device settings. Disabling necessary technologies may affect functionality.
